/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/x86_64-pokysdk-linux/usr/bin/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-g++      --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/cortexa9hf-vfp-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi  -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=neon -mtune=cortex-a9  -fpermissive -g    --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-fb/4.1.15-1.1.1/sysroots/cortexa9hf-vfp-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi CMakeFiles/neon-hello.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o neon-hello -rdynamic
